Classic black men's wallet. I'd give this 4.5 stars, but rounded up to 5. Wallets are very personal, so check the features before you purchase. Pros: - Comes packaged very nicely - New leather smell; soft leather - Very thin! - Holds 5 credit cards/insurance cards/license/ID cards and they are easy to insert/remove - RFID blocking is great, though I didn't test it - Stitching is solid  Cons: - It's a little wider than my current wallet; check dimensions, although good for international/European bills - "Hidden pocket" is a great concept but it's covered by a small flap of leather which looks a little unfinished - RFID blocking could be a disadvantage if you have e.g. a hotel room key that you want to keep in your wallet and use to open the door...
